What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Boggart Mob is in play
2. Tap Goblin Fireslinger to deal 1 damage to opponent
3. Boggart Mob's ability does not trigger What is the expected output? What do you see instead? I expect a token 1/1 creature to be created by the Boggart Mob, but the ability is not triggered. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.21 on 32bit Arch Linux 3.1.1 Please provide any additional information below.
